channel.title: A Bowl of Noatmeal
channel.description: Greetings! I'm Noatmeal and this is my blog. My goal is to mostly write about computer science, programming, and mathematics, but life tends to be interesting in a lot of other ways and so more general topics are bound to be discussed here.

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: A roadmap of where I intend to go with this blog in the near future.
